text: Whoever with malice aforethought, except as provided in §§ 22-2101, 22- 2102, kills another, is guilty of murder in the second degree. For purposes of imprisonment following revocation of release authorized by § 24- 403.01(b)(7), murder in the second degree is a Class A felony.
